title: Credit Card Payment Processing
description: As a customer, I want to pay for my order using a credit card so that I can complete my purchase securely.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter credit card details (number, expiry, CVV)
System validates card number using Luhn algorithm
System processes payment through payment gateway
User receives confirmation message upon successful payment
Failed payments display appropriate error messages
Payment information is encrypted during transmission

comments.author: Tech Lead
comments.text: Need to ensure PCI DSS compliance. Use tokenization for card storage.

comments.author: QA Lead
comments.text: Test cases created. Need to test with multiple card types.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: As a security-conscious user, I want to enable two-factor authentication on my account so that my account remains secure even if my password is compromised.
acceptance_criteria: User can enable/disable MFA from account settings
System supports SMS and authenticator app-based MFA
User receives setup instructions with QR code for authenticator apps
MFA code expires after 30 seconds
System allows backup codes for account recovery
Failed MFA attempts are logged for security monitoring
User can choose to 'trust this device' for 30 days

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Implemented SMS-based MFA. Working on authenticator app integration.

comments.author: Security Auditor
comments.text: Ensure rate limiting on MFA attempts to prevent brute force attacks.

title: PayPal Payment Integration
description: As a customer, I want to pay using PayPal so that I can use my existing PayPal balance or linked accounts without entering card details.
acceptance_criteria: PayPal option is displayed at checkout
User is redirected to PayPal for authentication
System handles PayPal callbacks correctly
Payment status is updated in real-time
User is redirected back to order confirmation page
System handles PayPal payment cancellations gracefully
Transaction IDs are stored for refund purposes

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Using PayPal REST API v2. Sandbox testing completed successfully.

comments.author: QA Engineer
comments.text: All test scenarios passed. Ready for production deployment.

title: Order History and Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to view my order history and track current orders so that I can monitor my purchases and delivery status.
acceptance_criteria: User can access order history from their account dashboard
Orders are sorted by date (most recent first)
Each order displays: order number, date, total amount, status
User can click on an order to view detailed information
Order details show: items, quantities, prices, shipping address
Active orders display real-time tracking information
User can download order invoice as PDF
System displays estimated delivery date

comments.author: UX Designer
comments.text: Created mockups for order history page. Focus on mobile responsiveness.

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Integrated with shipping provider API for real-time tracking.

title: Automated Refund Processing
description: As a customer service representative, I want to process refunds quickly so that customers receive their money back promptly and maintain satisfaction.
acceptance_criteria: CS rep can initiate refund from order details page
System supports full and partial refunds
Refund is processed through original payment method
Customer receives email notification of refund initiation
Refund status is tracked (pending, processed, completed)
System calculates refund amount including tax adjustments
Refund appears in customer account within specified timeframe
All refund transactions are logged for audit purposes

comments.author: Business Analyst
comments.text: Refund policy: Credit cards 5-7 days, PayPal 24-48 hours.

comments.author: QA Lead
comments.text: Testing various refund scenarios. Found edge case with partial refunds on discounted items.

title: Real-time Inventory Updates
description: As a warehouse manager, I want inventory levels to update in real-time so that I can prevent overselling and maintain accurate stock counts.
acceptance_criteria: Inventory is decremented immediately upon order confirmation
System reserves inventory during checkout process (15-minute hold)
Low stock alerts trigger when inventory falls below threshold
Inventory updates are reflected across all sales channels
System handles concurrent purchases correctly (no overselling)
Inventory adjustments are logged with timestamp and user
Dashboard displays current stock levels by product and warehouse
System supports bulk inventory updates via CSV import

comments.author: Database Admin
comments.text: Implemented database locking mechanism to prevent race conditions.

comments.author: QA Engineer
comments.text: Load testing completed. System handles 1000 concurrent transactions without overselling.

title: Sales Analytics Dashboard
description: As a sales manager, I want to view real-time sales analytics so that I can make data-driven business decisions and track performance metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays key metrics: total sales, orders, average order value
Data can be filtered by date range, product category, region
Charts show trends: daily sales, top products, customer segments
Dashboard updates in real-time (or near real-time)
User can export reports as PDF or Excel
Dashboard is responsive and works on tablets
System shows year-over-year comparison
Custom date ranges can be selected

comments.author: Data Engineer
comments.text: Building data pipeline. Using materialized views for performance.

comments.author: UX Designer
comments.text: Dashboard mockups ready. Focus on data visualization clarity.

title: User Profile Edit and Preferences
description: As a registered user, I want to edit my profile information and set preferences so that my account reflects my current details and personalized settings.
acceptance_criteria: User can update: name, email, phone number, profile picture
Email changes require verification via confirmation link
User can manage multiple shipping addresses
User can set default shipping and billing addresses
User can update communication preferences (email, SMS)
Changes are validated before saving (format checks)
User receives confirmation message after successful update
System maintains audit log of profile changes

comments.author: Security Team
comments.text: Ensure password re-authentication for sensitive changes like email update.

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Implemented image upload with validation (max 5MB, jpg/png only).

title: Advanced Product Search with Filters
description: As a customer, I want to search for products with filters so that I can quickly find items that meet my specific needs and preferences.
acceptance_criteria: Search bar is prominent on all pages
Search supports keyword, product name, SKU, category
Auto-complete suggestions appear as user types
Filters include: price range, category, brand, rating, availability
Search results update dynamically when filters are applied
User can sort results by: relevance, price, rating, newest
Search handles typos and suggests corrections
No results page suggests alternative searches or popular products
Search performance: results load within 500ms

comments.author: Backend Developer
comments.text: Using Elasticsearch for search. Implemented fuzzy matching and synonym support.

comments.author: Performance Engineer
comments.text: Search performance optimized. Average response time: 250ms.

title: Multi-channel Notification System
description: As a user, I want to receive notifications about important events so that I stay informed about my orders, account activity, and promotions.
acceptance_criteria: System sends notifications via: email, SMS, push notifications (mobile app)
User can customize notification preferences by type and channel
Notifications include: order confirmation, shipping updates, delivery, promotions
Notification templates are professional and branded
Notifications are sent in real-time or near real-time
User can opt-out of non-critical notifications
System respects quiet hours (no notifications 10 PM - 8 AM)
Notification delivery status is tracked and logged
Failed notification deliveries trigger retry mechanism

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Using Twilio for SMS and SendGrid for email. Push notifications via Firebase.

comments.author: QA Engineer
comments.text: Testing notification delivery across all channels. Minor timing issues with SMS gateway.
